summary: Ape-like aliens build a robotic Godzilla to destroy Japan, and the true Godzilla may not be powerful enough to destroy it.
cast: Masaaki Daimon|Kazuya Aoyama|Reiko Tajima|Akihiko Hirata|Hiromi Matsushita|Hiroshi Koizumi|Masao Imafuku|Bellbella Lin|Shin Kishida|Gorô Mutsumi|Daigo Kusano|Takayasu Torii|Kenji Sahara|Yasuzô Ogawa|Takamitsu Watanabe|Takanobu Toya|Koji Ozaki|Isao Zushi|Ise Mori|Kinichi Kusumi|Akio Kusama|Michael Kaye|Matthew Oram
title: Godzilla contra Cibergodzilla, máquina de destrucción
